name: Twin Stick (BearDogGames)
description:
An early prototype made in my first year of university

ajgreen91.wixsite.com/home

CONTROLS (with a pad)
Left stick - Move
Right stick - Aim & fire

POWERUPS
Blue - Spiral volley of bullets
Green/white - Timed explosion from player
Red drone - Automatically fires at the nearest enemy
Blue drone - Fires in the same direction as the player
Pink - Leaser beam

Permanent powerups will appear after each round

Thanks for images go to
https://www.clipartmax.com/middle/m2i8i8G6G6i8A0m2_spacecraft-clip-art-spaceship...
Skorpio - http://opengameart.org/users/skorpio
https://www.freeiconspng.com/img/40906- Transparent PNG Spacecraft
Carlos Alface
